title: Gayety
additional-notes: A note in the 1970 CCE Periodicals volume says to 'consult copyright office' for full issue renewal information.  The renewal for the first issue was recorded in the July-December 1977 CCE Periodicals volume, and was filed in 1970.

There was also a note in the January-June 1977 CCE Periodicals volume to consult to the copyright office for renewals of 'Gayety--The Zest of Life'.  This appears to be the same periodical, however, with that title appearing on the cover of some issues, such as number 6.
